function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on social well-being in the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of the built environment on social well-being","Mitigation":"Encourage and fund research on social well-being in the built environment","Technologies":"Research funding and collaboration platforms","People":"Urban residents, building professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Skewed focus on physical well-being in literature review","Impact":"Neglect of the impact of the built environment on social well-being","Mitigation":"Encourage a more balanced approach to research on health in the built environment","Technologies":"Research funding and collaboration platforms","People":"Building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in conducting research on social well-being in built environment","Impact":"Limited evidence-based insights for effective design of the built environment","Mitigation":"Develop standardized methodologies for assessing social well-being in the built environment","Technologies":"Data collection tools, sensor technology","People":"Building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, standards organizations"}]}
